Name: Invite Friend
ActivityDes: You can share your invite code to Lv.≥20 commandants. If they use your code, you will have invited them successfully.

Name: Invite Code
ActivityDes: Welcome back to Gray Raven HQ. You can input the invite code of other commandants to receive corresponding rewards.

Name: Returning Player Experience Survey
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
In order to create a better gaming environment, the Command Central has decided to conduct a survey regarding the in-game experiences of returning players. Please tap the [Advance] button below to share your thoughts! Rewards will be granted upon completion of the survey.

Name: Return Support
ActivityDes: During the event, commandants in the "Return" state can complete the missions and get the rewards (the event ends when the Return state expires).

Name: Monochrome Corridor
ActivityDes: Event Info:\n1. Complete event missions to obtain [Dodecahedron Dice].

Name: Reversed Order
ActivityDes: Event Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Fair Judgment].

Name: Elegy of Despair
ActivityDes: Event Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Teardrop Scales].

Name: Ever After
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Complete event missions to obtain [Fairy Tale Page].

Name: Character Leap - Crimson Abyss
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the new powers brought about by Leap in the tutorial stage.

Name: Target - Noctis
ActivityDes:
New Omniframe:

※A-Rank Lightning Attacker [Lamia: Echo]
New Weapon:
※6★ [Astraea] (Robotic Arms)

Info:
1. Character Research:
※[Lamia: Echo] will be available in the [Basic Research] Pool.
You have a 100% chance to get [Lucia: Crimson Weave] when you get an S-Rank character.
2. Weapon Research:
※[Astraea] will be available in the [Weapon Target] Research Pool
with the same rules and rates as other weapons.

Name: Arcade Anima
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52
Event Info:
1. Arcade Anima includes "Fragmented Memories" and "Heart-Lock Trial" modes, which contain character stories and character challenge stages respectively.
2. "Fragmented Memories" is unlocked by default. You will obtain a special collectible after experiencing all stories.
3. "Heart-Lock Trial" stages can only be challenged after you have deployed the corresponding Constructs.
4. You can complete the contract goals in the "Origins Contract" to obtain special bonuses in the "Heart-Lock Trial" mode.
5. Try to complete the 3-star stage goals in the "Heart-Lock Trial" as many as possible to obtain Construct-related special rewards including portraits, display poses, and stamps.

Name: Cradle Parade
ActivityDes: Event Info: Play through the new story [Cradle Parade] and complete missions.

Name: Sinking Shadows
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Stage open until: 2024/9/26, 06:59 (UTC)
Event shop open until: 2024/9/27, 01:59 (UTC)

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including DMG increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Sinking Shadows stages only.)

Name: Derived from Matrix
ActivityDes: Requirements: Commandant Lv.80\nEvent Info:\nStop the countdown and escape the illusions. Fasten the bonds of our hearts and arrive at the other side of the end.

Name: Guild Expedition IV
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Join a Command Bureau.
Event Info:

1. Join a Command Bureau and clear the stages with other Commandants.
2. Enemies found in the Cliff Fortress of the expedition area! Concentrate your firepower to destroy them!
3. The final boss Moon Eater will revive after being defeated. Can defeat it repeatedly!
4. Beat the final stage and clear Guild Expedition to claim stamps and a lot of loot.
5. Exchange loot for various rare materials in Guild Expedition Shop.

Name: Ice Queen Lulu
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Opening Hours: 2024/08/21 02:00 - 2024/09/19 06:59 (UTC)
Exchange Time: 2024/08/21 02:00 - 2024/09/22 06:59 (UTC)
Event Info:
1. Open a restaurant here with your Constructs. Experience a restaurant like no other. Come and create unforgettable memories with everyone!
2. Assign staff to the Prep Station to prepare Ingredients, to Cooking Station to cook them, and to the Service Area to sell the dishes for Ice Cream Coins. Use Mysterious Timers to make the facilities work faster.
3. Spend Ice Cream Coins to hire more staff and upgrade the restaurant.
4. Spend Ice Cream Coins to unlock more buffs. Apply buffs wisely to maximize your benefits.
5. Complete the Daily Missions and Achievement Missions in Ice Queen Lulu to obtain Lulu Vouchers that can be exchanged for Event Construct R&D Tickets, Trade Vouchers, and other items in the Event Shop.

Name: Old Lullabies
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40
Event Info:
1. There are a total of 5 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Cthylla] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset once knocked out during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Collectibles will be rewarded once you have earned a total of 3 stars. The more stars you earn, the higher the quality of the collectibles will be.

Name: Seamless Stars
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.60

Event Info:
1. Babel Tower is a set of high-difficulty stages.
2. Each stage has its own affixes, which will change the way the stage works.
3. You can select different strategic targets each stage. They will increase the difficulty of combat.
4. You can select affixes for stages. The affixes can aid you in combat.
5. The characters you used to complete the stages will be locked and become unavailable in other stages.
6. You will earn collectible rewards for joining Babel Tower. Your final strategic level will earn you different resource rewards and improve the collectible's quality.

Name: Summer Memoir
ActivityDes: Requirements: Commandant Lv.40\nEvent Info: New story and new Coatings.\nSpend the summer leisurely in the sound of the waves.

Name: Lingering Stars
ActivityDes: Event Info:\nPlay poker guessing to win commemorative coins! Invite your companions to a trip to the Shopping Street.

Name: Midsummer Rewind
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

Event Info:

1. This event requires a total of 3 players to play.
2. There are 5 maps in this event, which will be available one by one over time.
3. In this event, the closer your character is to the camera, the higher score you will reach. Extra points will be granted when all players are of the same faction and enter the picture together.
4. Complete the event missions for different rewards. Let's make unforgettable memories together!

Name: Summer Lucky Star
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Complete event missions to earn Celica Lottery Tickets to participate in the Summer Lucky Star event.
2. All Summer Lucky Star rewards can only be drawn once. Complete missions to earn enough Celica Lottery Tickets to participate in the event.
3. Participate in the event for a certain number of times to directly claim Event Construct R&D Tickets and other rewards!

Name: Tactical Assessment Manual
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Accumulate Intel Value by completing the Rate Missions of the Daily, the Weekly, and the current Intel Manual.
2. Raise the Rating Level by reaching the required Intel Value.
3. You will obtain the corresponding reward upon reaching the required Rating Level.
4. You can also purchase additional Intel to get better rewards.

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:
※S-Rank CUB [Cetus]
※Recommended Partner: [Lamia: Lost Lullaby]

Info:
1. CUB Description:

[Raging Waves] (Active Skill):
After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Cetus will swim toward the enemy, swing its tail, and backflip,
generating waves behind the target, dealing <color=#FF6347>350%</color> damage, and pushing the enemy to the character.

[Terrifying Vortex] (Active Skill):
After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Cetus will leap up, dive to the target location, and generate a vortex, dealing <color=#FF6347>320%</color> damage and applying Rigidity. <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color>: Immobilizes the enemy for 2s.

[Old Illusions] (Special Passive):
When Lamia: Lost Lullaby casts <color=#FF6347>Signature - Sunken Finale</color> with Cetus equipped, Base DMG will increase by <color=#FF6347>16%</color>. Casting <color=#FF6347>Blue Orb Skill - Ocean Break</color> and <color=#FF6347>Basic Attack - Abyssal Currents</color> will summon Cetus to launch a joint attack, dealing <color=#FF6347>500%</color> Dark DMG.

2. CUB Research:
※[Cetus] will enter the [CUB Research] pool.
  You may select an S-Rank CUB as the target in CUB Research.
  During the event, if you select [Cetus] as the target, it will be guaranteed when you draw an S-Rank CUB.

Name: Decor - Summer Moss
ActivityDes:
[Decor Pack]:
1. Summer Moss Decor Blueprint Pack at 20 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: 1 of each Decor Blueprint in the Set for a total of 18.
2. Decor Set at 68 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: Set Blueprint Bundle x3, Finished Decor, and Set Decor Blueprint Choice x20.
3. Decor Template Set at 68 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: Template Dormitory - all A-Rank Decor set that has 26 pieces of Decors.

Name: Nowhere Land
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40.

Stage open until: 2024/8/20, 06:59 (UTC)
Event shop open until: 2024/8/21, 01:59 (UTC)

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from the event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant Battle bonuses including DMG increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Nowhere Land stages only.)

Name: Special Dispatch - Sand Table Simulation
ActivityDes:
[Requirements]: Commandant Lv.52

 [Event Info]:
1. Special Dispatch - Sand Table Simulation consists of 4 areas, which will be available over time. Each area consists of various blocks. Clear a block to unlock the adjacent blocks.

2. Consume [Floating Processors] on [Battle] or [Dispatch] to obtain Block Contribution and event token [Trial Prototypes].

3. When there is enough Block Contribution contributed by all the players on the server, the block will be cleared and all the players will receive the reward and bonuses of the block.

4. Clear a block of the designated character to receive the corresponding trial character. The character will also gain a huge boost in battles of the event.

5. Clear the Amplification block and all the players on the server will receive [Amplification Sequences]; With enough Amplification Sequences, the Amplification Level will increase, granting stat bonuses and special stage buff.

6. Clear the [Dark Block] to unlock [Phase Results]. Result calculation will be carried out every hour and grant [Trial Prototypes]. With the clearance of the [Dark Blocks] in the areas, the reward settled every hour will get better.

7. Special Supplies: [Trial Prototypes] earned from the event can be exchanged for amazing rewards in the [Special Supplies].

Name: Clash Reflection
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.80

System Info:
1. Upon entering the mode, Commandants will be assigned to High Power Zone and Low Power Zone based on their level.
2. Commandants need to beat 14 challenges in the zones they were assigned to. And the character HP and Signature Energy will be carried over across challenges.
3. Defeating the opponent will grant "Creation Operators" as reward. Commandants will receive all Creation Operators accumulated by the completion of all challenges or stage reset.
4. Beating a challenge again after resetting the stage will also grant Creation Operators. Commandants who find it hard to beat all the enemies can challenge the stages repeatedly to earn Creation Operators.
5. Commandants can exchange Creation Operators for rewards.
6. Each Clash Reflection event lasts 14 days. At the end of each Clash Reflection event, all Creation Operators will be cleared and a new group of enemies set for Commandants to challenge.
7. The Creation Operator Rewards and Challenge Rewards reset at the end of each Clash Reflection event, but the Achievement Rewards won't. The Achievement Rewards remain the same regardless of the change of enemies.

Name: Abyssal Melody
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:

1. There are a total of 6 difficulty levels, all of which are highly challenging with [Lamia] being your formidable enemy.
2. All members will be reset upon being taken down during the challenge, making the challenge easier to complete.
3. Each stage has its own 3-star clearance conditions. Accumulate a certain number of stars to obtain stamp rewards.

Name: Dreams Inscribed
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

[Event Info]:
1. During the event, the [Dreams Inscribed] event mission will be available for a limited time.
2. The Gray Raven is once again together to start a TRPG in no time.

Name: Cat Grab
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Act at the right time and get them all! —A new Space Treasure Adventure has started!
2. New Special Space Resources, Grappling Hook Rends, and stage mechanisms. Take advantage of the bonuses in hand for high scores!
3. Capture Space Resources to accumulate Resource Points to purchase add-ons and upgrade UFO.

Name: Into the Deep
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Into the Deep consists of normal mode and challenge mode. And you will face a great number of enemies in the event.
2. Clear the stages to obtain "Song Fragments" and use them to unlock and upgrade add-ons for powerful effects.
3. In the event, you can only use one character and the damage value is by default hidden in stages.
4. Beat the challenges of specific Stars to obtain event stamps.

Name: CUB Target
ActivityDes:
New CUB:

※S-Rank CUB [Dawn Chorus]
※Recommended Partner: [Alisa: Echo]

Info:
1. CUB Description:

[Night Laser] (Active Skill): After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Dawn Chorus will fire a laser at the enemy, dealing <color=#0f70bc>300%</color> Physical DMG.

[Flash Assault] (Active Skill): 
After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Dawn Chorus will charge toward the enemy from a distance in mid-air, dealing <color=#0f70bc>250%</color> Physical DMG while granting the equipped character Super Armor for <color=#FF6347>3</color>s and Shield equal to <color=#FF6347>40%</color> of the CUB's ATK for 10s.

[Twilight Hour] (Special Passive):
When Alisa: Echo casts <color=#0f70bc>Signature - Celestial Edge</color> with Dawn Chorus equipped, CRIT DMG will increase by <color=#0f70bc>15%</color>. Casting <color=#0f70bc>Judgment Co-Strike</color> will summon Dawn Chorus to launch a joint attack, dealing <color=#0f70bc>500%</color> Physical DMG.

2. CUB Research:
※[Dawn Chorus] will enter the [CUB Research] pool.
  You may select an S-Rank CUB as the target in CUB Research.
  During the event, if you select [Dawn Chorus] as the target, it will be guaranteed when you draw an S-Rank CUB.

Name: Operation Energy Recycling
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Complete missions to earn event tokens for activating Detectors. Gain Points based on the detection results.
2. Earning enough Points will award you with the corresponding rewards, including the Karenina: Ember Coating "Bloody Love".
3. Once you reach the maximum Points with the "Common Detector", you will unlock the "Wide-Range Detector".
